articles.description: RALPH Hasenhuttl was left aghast after Che Adams fired two simple chances at the goalkeeper to see Saints slip to a 1-0 defeat at Crystal Palace.
articles.content:
RALPH Hasenhuttl was left aghast after Che Adams fired two simple chances at the goalkeeper to see Saints slip to a 1-0 defeat at Crystal Palace.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Qatar 'EVICT thousands of foreign workers ahead of the World Cup' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The move comes less than four weeks before the November 20 start of the global soccer tournament which has drawn intense international scrutiny of Qatar's treatment of foreign workers.
articles.content: Qatar has emptied apartment blocks housing thousands of foreign workers in the same areas in the centre of the capital Doha where visiting soccer fans will stay during the World Cup, according to wor… [+4769 chars]

articles.description: Ugo Monye has slammed the standard of Premiership officiating after London Irish were robbed of a victory at the death at Harlequins.
